# el-popover

## Properties

| Property              | Attribute                | Description            | Type                                     | Default    |
| --------------------- | ------------------------ | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `closeOnClickOutside` | `close-on-click-outside` | Close on click outside | `boolean`                                | `true`     |
| `open`                | `open`                   | Open state             | `boolean`                                | `false`    |
| `placement`           | `placement`              | Placement              | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'bottom'` |
| `trigger`             | `trigger`                | Trigger                | `"click" \| "focus" \| "hover"`          | `'click'`  |


## Events

| Event    | Description | Type                   |
| -------- | ----------- | ---------------------- |
| `elOpen` |             | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
